**Northampton's property values vary greatly based on location and usage.** Single-family homes on larger lots may assess at less than \$10,000 per acre, while commercial and mixed-use properties in the urban center can exceed \$10,000,000 per acre. The median value per acre is 
`r scales::label_currency()(round(median(resid_comm_with_value$Value_per_acre), -3))`.

**Explore this interactive map** to view assessed values per acre for residential, commercial, and industrial properties throughout Northampton. (Agricultural, recreational, educational, government, and utility parcels are not included.)

**Click on any property** for more information and a link to the assessor's card for the property.

```{r}
#| echo: false
map
```

Map based on 2023 parcel data from [MassGIS](https://www.mass.gov/info-details/massgis-data-property-tax-parcels).
